descriptionHtml:
[b]INTRODUCTION.[/b]

-In Skyrim game, the Skyforge Weapons share the same 3D models and textures from "normal" steel weapons despite the superior damage from Skyforge weapons.

-SKYFORGE VENGEANCE was created to distinguish normal steel weapons from Skyforge weapons.
The mod is very simple, it's just change the textures from the models, and add Skyforge Steel Armor(Heavy Armor) and "Skyforge Vengeance warhammer" both are retextured models.

-In the beginning i didn't planned to share this mod, so this mod it's not the most surprising mod you guys will see, but now i have plans to expand this mod and make much more "interesting".

[b]-INSTALLATION.[/b]

-Just extract the files in the "Data" folder.

[b]REQUIREMENTS.[/b]

-This mod do not require any DLC(for now!) or another mod.

-I play my game with the latest update, i don't know if play this mod in a non-updated game will cause a problem.

BUGS.

[b][u]-The one handed sword still use the normal steel textures, i will correct this in the next update.

-The Faceless Helmet from pictures it's not included!!! The 3D models it was having problems, in the next update i will restore the helmet.[/u][/b]

[b]NOTES.[/b]

-My english is not good!

-Latest update is the 1.0

-I will try to add a light armor set, a war hammer, shield arrows, and a mace made with Skyforge steel.

[b]-UPDATE LOG.[/b]

-13/09/2015 - Description updated.

- 23/08/2015 - This file was posted.
author: Bethesda and Retexture made by Me
